titleStmt.title: An Elegy on his much honoured and now lamented friend, John Collings, D.D. who departed this life the 18th of January, 1690, in the 67th year of his age.
titleStmt.author: White, Robert, 1645-1703.

notesStmt.note: Engraved portrait of Collinges by R. White [i.e. Robert White]
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
